## PR Checklist

### **Automated Tests:**
- [ ] All unit tests pass locally
- [ ] All integration tests pass locally
- [ ] Smoke tests pass (validates critical external integrations)
- [ ] CI tests will pass (checked locally)

### **Code Quality:**
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] No console.logs or debug code
- [ ] Code is properly commented
- [ ] No TypeScript/ESLint errors

### **Security:**
- [ ] No secrets or credentials in code
- [ ] All credentials stored in project secrets (Vercel/GitHub Secrets)
- [ ] No hardcoded API keys
- [ ] Environment variables used correctly

### **Documentation:**
- [ ] Code comments added/updated
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if needed)

### **External Integrations:**
- [ ] Google Maps API tested
- [ ] Google Gemini API tested
- [ ] Payment gateway tested (if applicable)
- [ ] Authentication tested (if applicable)
- [ ] All external APIs working

### **Deployment:**
- [ ] Ready for canary deployment
- [ ] Health checks will pass
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented)
- [ ] Migration scripts ready (if needed)

### **Review:**
- [ ] Self-reviewed code
- [ ] Ready for code owner review
- [ ] No blocking issues
